name: Aliens of Kaladram
overview: It is a vertical scrolling SEUCK game, in which you are flying through Kaladram, fighting against the hostile aliens. To save your people from an imminent invasion. An SOS signal from a satelite has been calling for help for some time. Some of our people got whisked to a hostile world of Kaladram. You find yourself a warpcraft and make your way through to Kaladram and ready for a taste of action. Fight your way through each zone inside Kaladram and fight the aliens. If you succeed, you're ok. Otherwise there is no chance of you coming back to Earth. Good luck.
